title: anyone else having problem connecting to server?
body: As per title, i have tried after restarting comp and it keeps saying can not connect to pvp server {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I'd suggest sending a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us If you want to know the status of the game then go here http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce


(The game is working fine for me).
Thanks for the reply but already checked server status and sent a ticket...wasn't working until this morning but it's working now :O

> [{quoted}](name=5318008,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=keEy3eOT,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-09T04:36:56.229+0000)
>
> Thanks for the reply but already checked server status and sent a ticket...wasn't working until this morning but it's working now :O

Glad it's working for you (:
